data.name: Cryweard
data.detailed_description:
"Cryweard" is an action RPG developed by a student, with the focus on the fun of bargaining and tense moments in battles.
A nameless warrior explores the world to unravel the mystery of "Cry" and confronts a powerful enemy called "Weard" while making full use of his magical powers.

Ergath...
It is the truth that Cry reflects.
The power that overcomes even the protection of Weard.
And the warrior awakens.

Beautiful and Fantastic World

Beautiful graphics drawn by the latest technology.

Explore every nook and cranny of dungeons, ruins, and caves.

A Wide Variety of Skills to Expand the Scope of Battle

You can learn a variety of skills from skill books found in various parts of the world.

Strengthen the skills you like and find the battle style that suits you best.

Multiple Parry Actions that Test Your Judgment

Dodge safely, Guard and lead to a powerful counterattack, absorb damage with Shield, or frighten the enemy with Rush.

Use these actions according to the enemy's attack and overwhelm the enemy.


* You may post videos and still images of this game on social networking sites and video distribution sites for commercial purposes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
